plot: A wealthy looking man climbs up a deserted crane planning to jump off. A homeless man drinks his beer on the same crane and enjoys the place. He spots the other man and offers him some beer...
title: Pe macara
plot_es: A wealthy looking man climbs up a deserted crane planning to jump off. A homeless man drinks his beer on the same crane and enjoys the place. He spots the other man and offers him some beer...
